Interesting quote, like to understand the definition of "alone" in March 2020 @RiverChess had sewage discharges for all 31 days, of which 21 were dry days. Because it had rained the previous month the @EnvAgency deeded all discharges were permitted.  "Alone" stopped on 1st April. https://t.co/XJEGta2Imp

urls.title: Hull & East Riding - CaBA
urls.description: Yorkshire Wildlife Trust 1 St. George's Place York YO24 1GN The CaBA Partnership for the Hull and East Riding management catchment was established in 2014. It is hosted by the Yorkshire Wildlife Trust with support f rom the East Yorkshire Rivers Trust as Joint Host. They are joined on the partnership by 13 other organisations that take an interest in the management and enhancement of the water bodies in the Hull and East Riding area.
